definition: to entertain/to repay/to return/to reward/to compensate/to reply/to answer

sentences.english: Yes, yesterday was the my pay-day; I pay you the payment today.
sentences.chinese: 是地，昨天是咋哒发薪日，俺今天付给你报酬。

sentences.english: But they are willing to teach even though they're not getting paid what they should get paid.
sentences.chinese: 他们还是愿意去教，虽然他们并没得到应得的报酬。

sentences.english: In New Zealand, welfare payments, pensions and other compensation.
sentences.chinese: 在新西兰接受福利费，养老金和其它报酬。

sentences.english: No laws forbid payment to volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 法律没有禁止给予志愿者报酬。

sentences.english: And paid for learning with your empty praise.
sentences.chinese: 你们对学问的报酬只是空口赞美。

sentences.english: She exhorts me to accept that new position although that position reward is not munificent .
sentences.chinese: 她力劝我接受那个新职位，虽然那职位报酬并不优厚。

sentences.english: The workings of the incentive mechanism are based on priority-based reward system.
sentences.chinese: 这种激励机制是通过基于优先权的报酬系统来运作的。

sentences.english: A person should be remunerated for his work.
sentences.chinese: 一个人做了工作，就要得到报酬。

sentences.english: Ep694 - Shimin agrees to work for Yingming with more rewards compared with his supervisor.
sentences.chinese: 世民愿继续与英明合作，但要求更多报酬。

sentences.english: Dr. Smith was not paid because he was the honorary chairman of the society.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯博士不获报酬，因为他是那个团体的名誉主席。

sentences.english: Get a bag to carry the gold and you shall be paid.
sentences.chinese: 拿一只口袋来装金子，你会得到报酬的。

sentences.english: Dr. McCarron is paid for offering scientific advice to the Salt Institute.
sentences.chinese: 麦卡隆博士则为研究会提供科学建议并因此获得报酬。

sentences.english: It could be years before we get our payment.
sentences.chinese: 等拿到报酬，都不知何年何月了。

sentences.english: They asked him what reward he wanted.
sentences.chinese: 他们问他想要什么报酬。

sentences.english: This kind of equity-based compensation system still involves widely disputes and needs further improvement.
sentences.chinese: 这种权益为主的报酬体制仍存在广泛争议，有待完善。

sentences.english: "They were working without pay because they couldn't go home," said Jayaseelan.
sentences.chinese: 她们在工作，却没有报酬，因为她们不能回家。

definition: to make a profit/to earn a packet
